commenter_a: It's a Prince song and it belongs to him. She just found a hit that he threw away. He was just that good.
post_message: There's a moment in “Nothing Compares 2 U” in which a doctor tells O’Connor “Girl, you better try to have fun, no matter what you do.” The advice is patently dumb—though not unfamiliar to any woman who has ever been told to just smile.
